Sunday, March 13, 2005

The deficiencies of synchronous requests

Posted by admin

Jamis Buck has a good examination of the problems inhibiting the use of synchronous requests in the Ajax world. Synchronous is a much easier programatically model, have worked well for Ta-da List, but certainly not without its flaws. Good debate.
